title: Debt finance deal will 'maximise returns' for Genex's Tesla battery project in Queensland, Australia - Energy Storage News
content: Debt finance deal will 'maximise returns' for Genex's Tesla battery project in Queensland, Australia  Energy Storage News
description: Genex Power has received credit approvals on a AU$35 million (US$25.26 million) debt finance facility for its 50MW/100MWh Bouldercombe battery energy storage system (BESS) project in Queensland, Australia.Â
